longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid on arrival. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of
  Argentina . 
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports.

Visa required, except for A max. stay of 3 months:
 - for holders of normal, emergency or temporary passports or
   National ID Cards issued to nationals of
   Argentina 
Visa required, except for Nationals of Argentina whose
passport or travel document state Uruguay as place of birth
